bio:treatment.other_name: Pellaea flexuosa (Kaulfuss ex Schlechtendal & Chamisso) Link
bio:treatment.discussion: Populations of Pellaea ovata in the flora are composed of sexual diploids; an apogamous triploid cytotype predominates south of the United States. I have not seen herbarium specimens to substantiate reports of P . ovata from New Mexico (D. B. Lellinger 1985).
